Package etomica.molecule

Class MoleculeOriented

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.molecule.Molecule
      • etomica.molecule.MoleculeOriented
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMolecule, IMoleculeOriented, IMoleculePositioned
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoleculeOrientedDynamic

    public class MoleculeOriented
extends Molecule
implements IMoleculeOriented
    Molecule class appropriate for a rigid molecule. The molecule object holds a position and orientation fields.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getOrientation

        public IOrientation3D getOrientation​()
        Description copied from interface: IMoleculeOriented
        Returns the orientation of the IAtom. Modifying the returned IVector will alter the IAtom's position.
        Specified by:
        getOrientation in interface IMoleculeOriented

      • getPosition

        public Vector getPosition​()
        Description copied from interface: IMoleculePositioned
        Returns the position of the IMolecule. Modifying the returned Vector will alter the IMolecule's position, but not any positions of the IMolecule's child IAtoms.
        Specified by:
        getPosition in interface IMoleculePositioned
